title: Friday Zeit Lights 9/28: David Attenborough, Rooney Mara, Ilhan Omar, Joe Montana, Civvl
itunes:title: Friday Zeit Lights 9/28: David Attenborough, Rooney Mara, Ilhan Omar, Joe Montana, Civvl
description:
On this edition of Friday Zeit Lights Jack and Jamie discuss David Attenborough joining Instagram, Rooney Mara and Joaquin Phoenix named their first child "River", Project Veritas pushing a fake story about Ilhan Omar, Joe Montana stopped a kidnapping, and a short discussion of the evicting app, Civvl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
